<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.17</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.sn_hr_wday" name="Human Resources Scoped App: Workday Integration" state="published" help="CSHelp:Workday_Integration" version="1.0.17" type="application" provider_name="ServiceNow" licensable="true" scope_name="sn_hr_wday" scope_sys_id="592da2705b021200a4656ede91f91a8a">
<description>Provides automatic updates of HR application tables from a linked Workday instance. Activation of this plugin on production instances may require a separate license. Contact ServiceNow for details. </description> <requires> <import plugin="com.sn_hr_core"/> </requires> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Provides automatic updates of HR application tables from a linked Workday instance. Activation of this plugin on production instances may require a separate license.
